title: the spiner still rolling
body: i'm stuck at : Login status : authenticating > it's been two days , i don't know what Riot thinks of this problem , but please make it quick

replies.body: Sometimes certain things like antivirus or firewalls might block your connections to our authentication servers. Double check that you don't have anything blocking your network's access by [**disabling any firewalls**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3) and antivirus temporarily. If that doesn't help, be sure to let me know in a reply so we can try a few other things!
